name: AMazeIn Pairs of Pents
description:
For fans of AMazeIn Pentominoes here is a first expansion pack of the popular pentomino-themed mazes. Find a route that visits exactly one cell of every pentomino (no more no less). 

  • Number of puzzles: 68
  • Average play time: 1h
  • First published: September 2021 (exclusive to itch.io)
  • Inspired by: Exactly1 Mazes  
  • Keyboard controls: arrow keys or WASD to move; [Z] (or backstep) to undo; [R] for restart.
  • Touchscreen controls: tap at the main menu; swipe to move; open the tab menu in the upper left to undo moves and restart.

Explore more of Erich's puzzles at: Puzzle Palace  
See also: The Erich Friedman puzzle collection - by pedroPSI

puzzlescript implementation - Matthieu Haller - 2021  
puzzle concept and designs - Erich Friedman - 2021
